dataQuery.sqlStatement:
SELECT CO_CONF_EM_TM_ENR.ID_EM EmpID, PA_EM.NM_EM EmployeeName,
case when TS_EM_TM_IN is not null then SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(TS_EM_TM_IN, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 1, 10) else SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(TS_EM_TM_IN, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 1, 10) end DateIn, ID_LU_CD_I8.DE_CD_ENT TimeType, TS_EM_TM_IN_STR TimeIn, TS_EM_TM_OUT_STR TimeOut,
case when (ty_tm = '0' AND (TS_EM_TM_IN_STR is null or TS_EM_TM_OUT_STR is null)) then 1 else 0 end MissingRegPunches,
case when (ty_tm != '0' AND (TS_EM_TM_IN_STR is null or TS_EM_TM_OUT_STR is null)) then 1 else 0 end MissingOtherPunches, FL_MOD ModifiedFlag,
case when (ty_tm != '0' AND (TS_EM_TM_IN_STR is null OR TS_EM_TM_OUT_STR is null) AND HRS_STR is null) then 0 else HRS_STR end regHours,
case when ( ty_tm = '0' AND(TS_EM_TM_IN_STR is null OR TS_EM_TM_OUT_STR is null) AND OTHER_HRS_STR is null) then 0 else OTHER_HRS_STR end otherHours, HRS_STR + OTHER_HRS_STR totalHours FROM CO_CONF_EM_TM_ENR, PA_EM, ID_LU_CD_I8 WHERE PA_EM.ID_EM = CO_CONF_EM_TM_ENR.ID_EM AND PA_EM.ID_EM IN (SELECT ID_EM FROM PA_EM WHERE SC_EM='1'
AND ((case when cast(:employeeID as varchar(20)) != 'All' AND cast(:employeeID as varchar(20)) != 'None' then cast(:employeeID as varchar(20)) else 'doNothing' end) = 'doNothing' OR PA_EM.ID_EM = (case when cast(:employeeID as varchar(20)) != 'All' AND cast(:employeeID as varchar(20)) != 'None' then cast(:employeeID as varchar(20)) else 'doNothing' end))
) AND FL_DEL = '0' AND CO_CONF_EM_TM_ENR.ID_STR_RT = :storeId AND ((SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(TS_EM_TM_IN, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 1, 10) BETWEEN SUBSTR(:startDate,1,10) AND SUBSTR(:endDate,1,10)) OR (SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(TS_EM_TM_OUT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 1, 10) BETWEEN SUBSTR(:startDate,1,10) AND SUBSTR(:endDate,1,10))) AND ID_LU_CD_I8.LCL = :locale AND ID_LU_CD_I8.DE_CD_LST = 'TimeTypeCodes' AND CO_CONF_EM_TM_ENR.TY_TM = ID_LU_CD_I8.LU_CD_ENT ORDER BY CO_CONF_EM_TM_ENR.ID_EM, TS_EM_TM_IN

SELECT ID_STR_RT, sum(case when ty_tm='1' then (case when OTHER_HRS_STR is null then 0 else OTHER_HRS_STR end) else 0 end) SICK_HRS, sum(case when ty_tm='1' and (TS_EM_TM_IN_STR is null or TS_EM_TM_OUT_STR is null) then 1 else 0 end) MISSING_SICK_PUNCHES, sum(case when ty_tm='2' then (case when OTHER_HRS_STR is null then 0 else OTHER_HRS_STR end) else 0 end) VACATION_HRS, sum(case when ty_tm='2' and (TS_EM_TM_IN_STR is null or TS_EM_TM_OUT_STR is null) then 1 else 0 end) MISSING_VACATION_PUNCHES, sum(case when ty_tm='3' then (case when OTHER_HRS_STR is null then 0 else OTHER_HRS_STR end) else 0 end) COMPDAY_HRS, sum(case when ty_tm='3' and (TS_EM_TM_IN_STR is null or TS_EM_TM_OUT_STR is null) then 1 else 0 end) MISSING_COMPDAY_PUNCHES, sum(case when ty_tm='4' then (case when OTHER_HRS_STR is null then 0 else OTHER_HRS_STR end) else 0 end) JURY_HRS, sum(case when ty_tm='4' and (TS_EM_TM_IN_STR is null or TS_EM_TM_OUT_STR is null) then 1 else 0 end) MISSING_JURY_PUNCHES, sum(case when ty_tm='5' then (case when OTHER_HRS_STR is null then 0 else OTHER_HRS_STR end) else 0 end) PERSONAL_HRS, sum(case when ty_tm='5' and (TS_EM_TM_IN_STR is null or TS_EM_TM_OUT_STR is null) then 1 else 0 end) MISSING_PERSONAL_PUNCHES, sum(case when ty_tm='6' then (case when OTHER_HRS_STR is null then 0 else OTHER_HRS_STR end) else 0 end) FUNERAL_HRS, sum(case when ty_tm='6' and (TS_EM_TM_IN_STR is null or TS_EM_TM_OUT_STR is null) then 1 else 0 end) MISSING_FUNERAL_PUNCHES FROM CO_CONF_EM_TM_ENR WHERE FL_DEL = '0' AND CO_CONF_EM_TM_ENR.ID_STR_RT = :storeId AND ((SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(TS_EM_TM_IN, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 1, 10) >= SUBSTR(:startDate,1,10) OR TS_EM_TM_IN is NULL) AND (SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(TS_EM_TM_OUT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 1, 10) <= SUBSTR(:endDate,1,10)) OR TS_EM_TM_OUT is null) AND ID_EM IN (SELECT ID_EM FROM PA_EM WHERE SC_EM='1'
AND ((case when cast(:employeeID as varchar(20)) != 'All' AND cast(:employeeID as varchar(20)) != 'None' then cast(:employeeID as varchar(20)) else 'doNothing' end) = 'doNothing' OR PA_EM.ID_EM = (case when cast(:employeeID as varchar(20)) != 'All' AND cast(:employeeID as varchar(20)) != 'None' then cast(:employeeID as varchar(20)) else 'doNothing' end)))
GROUP BY ID_STR_RT
SELECT id_str_rt stId, nm_loc stName FROM pa_str_rtl_i8 WHERE id_str_rt = :storeId AND lcl = :locale
